<p> NavigationInfo describes the user's viewing model, user navigation-interaction modalities, and also dimensional characteristics of the user's (typically invisible) avatar. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#NavigationInfo" target="_blank">NavigationInfo</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html" target="_blank">23 Navigation component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Concepts" target="_blank">23.2 Concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#OverviewOfNavigation" target="_blank">23.2.1 An overview of navigation</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Navigationparadigms" target="_blank">23.2.2 Navigation paradigms</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Collisiondetection" target="_blank">23.2.4 Collision detection and terrain following</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#NavigationInfo" target="_blank">23.4.4 NavigationInfo</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/" target="_blank">VRML 2 Sourcebook</a> has examples scattered throughout the archive. </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter04ViewingNavigation" target="_blank">Chapter 04 Viewing Navigation</a> </li> </ul>
